description:
Everything is out to get poor Mike. Portals that slice him to bits. Demons with giant swords. Scary eyeballs. Killer statues. And other, horrible things, that we can't mention in this family-friendly description.

Only your platforming skills can keep Mike alive!

- Explore a massive non-linear spaceship, with like, a million secret areas.

- Dying is actually fun! You will only feel bad for Mike a little bit.

- Multiple endings! Unravel Mikeâ€™s enigmatic past and discover his true fate!

- Epic boss encounters!

- Fully voice acted!

*No actual Mikes were harmed in the making of this title.
name: Mike Dies
